serviceName.title: Service Name
serviceName.description: The name of the ECS service

serviceArn.title: ARN
serviceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service

clusterArn.title: Cluster ARN
clusterArn.description: The ARN of the cluster that hosts the service

taskDefinition.title: Task Definition
taskDefinition.description: The ARN of the task definition associated with the service

desiredCount.title: Desired Count
desiredCount.description: The desired number of tasks for the service

runningCount.title: Running Count
runningCount.description: The number of tasks that are currently running

pendingCount.title: Pending Count
pendingCount.description: The number of tasks in the PENDING state

launchType.title: Launch Type
launchType.description: The launch type of the service

schedulingStrategy.title: Scheduling Strategy
schedulingStrategy.description: The scheduling strategy to use for the service

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the service

deploymentConfiguration.title: Deployment Configuration
deploymentConfiguration.description: The deployment configuration for the service

deploymentController.title: Deployment Controller
deploymentController.description: The deployment controller type for the service

deployments.title: Deployments
deployments.description: The current deployments of the service

enableECSManagedTags.title: ECS Managed Tags
enableECSManagedTags.description: Whether to enable ECS managed tags

enableExecuteCommand.title: Execute Command
enableExecuteCommand.description: Whether to enable ECS Exec for the service

events.title: Events
events.description: The events associated with the service

healthCheckGracePeriodSeconds.title: Health Check Grace Period
healthCheckGracePeriodSeconds.description: The grace period for health checks in seconds

loadBalancers.title: Load Balancers
loadBalancers.description: The load balancers associated with the service

networkConfiguration.title: Network Configuration
networkConfiguration.description: The network configuration for the service

placementConstraints.title: Placement Constraints
placementConstraints.description: The placement constraints for the service

placementStrategy.title: Placement Strategy
placementStrategy.description: The placement strategy for the service

platformFamily.title: Platform Family
platformFamily.description: The platform family for the service

platformVersion.title: Platform Version
platformVersion.description: The platform version for the service

propagateTags.title: Propagate Tags
propagateTags.description: Whether to propagate tags from the service or task definition

roleArn.title: Role ARN
roleArn.description: The ARN of the IAM role associated with the service

serviceRegistries.title: Service Registries
serviceRegistries.description: The service registries associated with the service

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: The tags associated with the service

taskSets.title: Task Sets
taskSets.description: The task sets associated with the service

capacityProviderStrategy.title: Capacity Provider Strategy
capacityProviderStrategy.description: The capacity provider strategy for the service

availabilityZoneRebalancing.title: Availability Zone Rebalancing
availabilityZoneRebalancing.description: Whether availability zone rebalancing is enabled

createdAt.title: Created At
createdAt.description: The timestamp when the service was created

createdBy.title: Created By
createdBy.description: The ARN of the entity that created the service
